definition[0]: a detailed instruction about how a building, car, piece of equipment etc should be made
example[0]: the specs for the company’s new video games console
definition[1]: detailed instructions about how something should be designed or made
example[1]: We have made a few alterations to the design spec.
definition[2]: the spec of a machine, computer etc is the combination of all its special features
example[2]: The two cars share very similar specs.
definition[3]: if you do something on spec, you do it without being sure that you will get what you are hoping for
example[3]: I sent in an application on spec, but I still haven’t heard from them about any jobs.
